resources.string: %1$s is not a valid postal code.
This is not a valid Canadian postal code. Please go back.
This postal code is not associated with any representatives according to the API. Please try a different postal code.
There has been an error. You likely have no Internet. Please go back and try again.
There has been an error with getting your location. Make sure your device location is turned on. Opening Google Maps and requesting your location there first may help.
